titleStmt.title: Lectures upon the vvhole Epistle of St. Paul to the Philippians, deliuered in St. Peters Church in Oxford: by the reuerend and faithfull seruant of Christ Henry Airay ... and now published for the vse of Gods Church by C.P. ...
titleStmt.author: Airay, Henry, 1560?-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw: Griffin [and Richard Field] for William Bladen, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bible neere the great north doore,

notesStmt.note: Richard Field's name supplied from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bible neere the great north doore
